alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:01PM MDT until July 12 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAS ANIMAS COUNTY... At 300 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Segundo, or 10 miles west of Trinidad, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 1 inch hail just south of Boncarbo. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Cokedale, Starkville, Raton Pass, Boncarbo, Hoehne and Segundo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
